COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: It was the day of the recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106
STRING: I had put on my uniform, and I readjusted my Fortelle
case with renewed purpose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c
STRING: [Chris] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x164
STRING: Determination rang clear in our voices.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e
STRING: What we were going to do today was not exactly
something that the school would appreciate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194
STRING: A Fortelle student performing alone at his graduation
recital.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a0
STRING: Probably... No, I'm sure that had never happened
before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: I probably wouldn't be given an evaluation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b8
STRING: But I didn't mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4
STRING: Standing on stage with this musical fairy beside me was
meaningful enough.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: I didn't care whether her voice could be heard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: Sharing my last time on stage with her was important in
itself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e
STRING: I'd spent almost every second since that day practicing,
and things went perfectly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x234
STRING: I could've performed without the score.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: But that score in my bag was the first thing that Phorni
and I had created together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: It was like a protective charm, just looking at it calmed
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x288
STRING: [Phorni] “What time are you performing today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm going on first after noon, so we have about
half an hour, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: After talking to Torta that day, I'd checked the bulletin
board.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ca
STRING: All the practice rooms were open, but I'd practiced at
home in the morning.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e0
STRING: All that was left was to wait for the real thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: I lacked neither skill nor energy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31a
STRING: Even with the graduation ceremony, I had no more than
a few days left to walk down this familiar avenue.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x330
STRING: I never did get used to this school, but right then, I felt a
surprising sense of nostalgia.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x346
STRING: There was no doubt that I was affected by the overall
sense that things were coming to an end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x35c
STRING: The audience's reaction to my performance would
decide.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368
STRING: I don't mean that it would decide everything for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: It meant nothing more than a grade, a mere evaluation
by the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x380
STRING: In any case, I wasn't about to become a professional
musician.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c
STRING: The future had already been decided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: Even though it was lunchtime, the hall was abuzz with
activity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d6
STRING: Many guests had come to watch the graduation recitals,
and because seats had been reserved for them, there
were surprisingly few seats left for students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: Those students who were serious about listening to the
performances never left their seats, apparently, so that
they wouldn't be taken by others.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x402
STRING: Ms. Cordell had shared that information with me, when
I'd failed to get a seat at last year's recitals.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43a
STRING: We reached the side of the stage exactly fifteen
minutes before my turn to perform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x450
STRING: It was exactly as the bulletin board had said.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c
STRING: A student worker told me that those going on after a
break were to prepare their equipment while the
curtain was down, so I quickly set up my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47c
STRING: On the other side of the curtain, the audience was
getting noisier by the second, which told me that it was
almost time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492
STRING: Phorni was seated on my shoulder as always, looking
relaxed, without a hint of anxiety.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ec
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x502
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Ms. Cordell. Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x534
STRING: [Cordell] “...It's past noon. And where's your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: I hadn't come to school since that day I met Torta here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x574
STRING: I hadn't had any lessons with Ms. Cordell since last year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x58a
STRING: Students decided for themselves whether to practice at
school or at home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5a0
STRING: Since that day, I hadn't seen Asino or Torta either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: But that had probably been for the best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b8
STRING: I was sure that everyone would've objected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c4
STRING: [Chris] “About my partner...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ee
STRING: I looked down at my shoulder and locked eyes with my
very important partner.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60c
STRING: [Cordell] “...Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x63e
STRING: The buzzer sounded, and I saw through an opening in
the curtain that the hall lights had been dimmed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x670
STRING: [Cordell] “This is bad. Your partner isn't here yet? We
could delay your performance, if needed.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x690
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ae
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c4
STRING: [Chris] “It's okay, I'll perform.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6f6
STRING: [Phorni] “Sorry, Ms. Cordell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70c
STRING: Phorni apologized even though she knew she couldn't
be heard.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x722
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry. But I'm going on stage like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x738
STRING: The machinery responsible for raising the curtain started
reeling in the chains, creaking audibly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x756
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris...!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76c
STRING: It was a restrained shout, but I could hear the
disapproval in Ms. Cordell's voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x782
STRING: At the same time, there was an announcement over the
speakers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x798
STRING: And then, my name was called.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a4
STRING: [Chris] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ec
STRING: Facing Ms. Cordell, I gave a deep bow, and then I
walked on stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x840
STRING: Standing in the lights, I closed my eyes for just one
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84c
STRING: My eyes adjusted, and I sat down in front of the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x858
STRING: Phorni got down from my shoulder and hovered just
above the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86e
STRING: I opened the score and placed it on the stand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x87a
STRING: With that, my preparations were complete.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a2
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, shall we?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b8
STRING: Phorni sounded very upbeat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8c4
STRING: I couldn't respond, of course, so I nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ec
STRING: Here and there, I could hear sections of the audience
reacting.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: It seemed no one had noticed Phorni's presence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x904
STRING: If they had, their reaction would've been even louder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91a
STRING: And then I saw Torta sitting in the first row.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x930
STRING: For one second, our eyes met.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93c
STRING: Torta seemed shocked, then she looked around
nervously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x952
STRING: Other people in the audience were also looking around
to see if someone else would come on stage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x968
STRING: To demonstrate my intent, I placed my fingers on the
Fortelle keyboard and played the first note.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: After it was over, I stood up slowly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c4
STRING: I wasn't expecting any applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d0
STRING: I simply felt sorry for each and every member of the
audience who hadn't been able to hear Phorni's
marvelous voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa36
STRING: A second later, we were engulfed in thunderous
applause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7c
STRING: [Phorni] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa92
STRING: I realized right away that the applause was for us, but
that was followed by extreme vexation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa8
STRING: [Chris] “...Did they hear you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac6
STRING: [Phorni] “... Looks like it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xadc
STRING: I remained on stage, forgetting I had to take a bow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae8
STRING: But the applause just wouldn't stop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: Not knowing what to do, I started to panic, and then I
saw Ms. Cordell waving to me from offstage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: I bowed, just barely, and walked offstage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Cordell] “...Chris. What just happened?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5a
STRING: Ms. Cordell's voice could barely contain her excitement.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb70
STRING: To be honest, I had wanted to ask her the exact same
question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7c
STRING: [Chris] “...Um, I don't really know, actually.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9a
STRING: [Cordell] “Who was singing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb0
STRING: [Chris] “...My partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc6
STRING: From her seat on my shoulder, Phorni waved at Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: There was no way she could've seen it, but Ms. Cordell
smiled, as if convinced somehow, and lightly smacked
my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0e
STRING: [Cordell] “I don't know how you did it, but you did well.
That was the best performance I've ever heard. No
doubt about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2e
STRING: [Chris] “...O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: It was the first time I'd ever heard such direct praise
from her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5a
STRING: I should've been overjoyed, but I still couldn't quite
believe it, so my response was somewhat muted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc78
STRING: [Cordell] “How amusing. Everyone, confused by a voice
that shouldn't be heard...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca6
STRING: Proving that even she herself was confused, Ms. Cordell
just stood there taking in the reactions of the audience,
unconcerned that she was in the way of the next
student to perform.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: [Chris] “...What should we do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Phorni] “Escape, probably.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “I think that's a good idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd40
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, let's get going.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd56
STRING: [Chris] “Alright.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd88
STRING: [Cordell] “H-Hey, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9e
STRING: [Chris] “Please excuse me. If I'm allowed to graduate, I'll
show up at the ceremony.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbe
STRING: With those words, I ran outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd8
STRING: The hall still echoed with the sound of people
whispering to one another.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: They had whispered throughout the performance too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: But I didn't care.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: I looked once more at Phorni, then we bowed in unison.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: Finally, I sought out Torta in the front row and
acknowledged her with a look.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe28
STRING: It wasn't a satisfactory performance, but I'd done my
best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3e
STRING: I walked offstage.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe88
STRING: [Cordell] “...What was that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9e
STRING: [Chris] “I couldn't find anyone. That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebc
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, why didn't you tell me... Something
could've been arranged.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xedc
STRING: [Chris] “No, this was fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0e
STRING: [Cordell] “You might not graduate, you realize?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf24
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. Even so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf42
STRING: [Cordell] “Do you intend to stay another year? Well, as
a Fortelle student you don't have to worry about fees,
but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf62
STRING: [Chris] “I don't intend to stay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf80
STRING: [Cordell] “Then what do you intend to do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf96
STRING: [Chris] “I'll go back home and pursue a different path.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc8
STRING: [Cordell] “...Well, your expression tells me you'll have
no regrets.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe8
STRING: [Chris] “You are quite right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffe
STRING: I nodded and looked at Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: [Phorni] “You really do look relieved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x103c
STRING: Without responding, I looked at Ms. Cordell once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1064
STRING: [Cordell] “You played with a clear sound, free of
sadness. That's all the praise you'll get.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1084
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you very much.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: I bowed deeply to her, then I left the hall.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f2
STRING: [Chris] “What should we do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: It was all over, and whatever the outcome, I felt totally
refreshed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1114
STRING: Phorni floated onto the desk and spread her wings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113c
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, you have to go back home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: Phorni spoke gently, at the same time that I got down
on my knees.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1168
STRING: [Chris] “Come with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1186
STRING: [Phorni] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119c
STRING: Phorni placed her tiny hand on top of mine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: That was the very future I had pictured once upon a
time.
